principalBelongsAdminUnit: MATCH (s:principal {guid:{src}}),(d:admin_unit {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:belongs]->(d) SET r.is_admin={isAdmin} RETURN r as rid
detachPrincipalBelongsAdminUnit: MATCH (s:principal {guid:{src}})-[r:belongs{is_admin:{isAdmin}}]->(d:admin_unit {guid:{dest}}) DELETE r RETURN r as rid
createLink: MATCH (s:SRC_LBL {guid:{src}}),(d:DEST_LBL {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:REL]->(d) RETURN r as rid
